title: Direction of magnetic field near two crossed wires

content.question: In the figure above, two long, straight, insulated wires at right angles in the plane of the page carry currents of I and 2I, as shown. What is the direction of the magnetic field at point P, which is equidistant from the wires and coplanar with them?

choices.label: Answer choice C is an arrow pointing down and to the right.
Answer choice D is an arrow pointing up and to the left.
Answer choice E is an arrow pointing up and to the right.
